channel.title: Nihal Nayak on SBMARUF

item.title: Multitask Prompted Training Enables Zero-Shot Task Generalization
item.description: T0 shows zero-shot task generalization on English natural language prompts, outperforming GPT-3 on many tasks, while being 16x smaller!
